hero.title: West Africa Design Forum
hero.subtitle: Empowering Design Innovation Across West Africa

about.title: About WADF
about.subtitle: The West Africa Design Forum is a pioneering initiative dedicated to elevating the region's creative industry, fostering collaboration, and showcasing the immense talent present within West Africa.
about.missionText: WADF exists to empower and connect designers, promote cultural heritage, and foster innovation across West Africa. We believe in creating a persistent digital community that transforms our annual event into a year-round platform for discussion, networking, and knowledge sharing.
about.visionText: To be West Africa's leading platform for creative excellence, innovation, and collaboration, connecting designers and innovators across borders and disciplines.
about.whatWeDoText: Through our annual conference, workshops, and digital platform, we provide opportunities for designers to learn, share, and grow together.

faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about WADF 2026

general.title: General
general.q1: What is the West Africa Design Forum?
general.a1: WADF is the premier event celebrating and elevating West Africa's creative industry. It's a multi-day conference bringing together designers, innovators, and industry experts from across the region and beyond.
general.a2: WADF 2026 will take place June 15-17, 2026 at the Eko Convention Centre in Lagos, Nigeria.
general.a3: WADF is perfect for designers, product managers, creative professionals, entrepreneurs, students, and anyone interested in West Africa's creative economy and innovation landscape.

tickets.title: Tickets
tickets.q1: How do I purchase a ticket?
tickets.a1: Simply visit the Tickets page, select your preferred pass (Early Bird, Regular, or VIP), and complete the secure checkout process. Your account will be automatically created upon successful payment.
tickets.q2: What's included in each ticket type?
tickets.a2: All tickets include full conference access, sessions, workshops, networking events, and a digital certificate. VIP passes add exclusive benefits like lounge access, priority seating, speaker meet & greets, and premium swag.
tickets.a3: Tickets are generally non-refundable. However, we offer ticket transfers if you can't attend. Contact our support team for special circumstances.
tickets.q4: What payment methods do you accept?
tickets.a4: We accept all major credit/debit cards and mobile money through our secure payment partners Paystack and Flutterwave.

speakers.title: Speakers
speakers.q1: How do I submit a session proposal?
speakers.a1: Visit the Call for Proposals page, sign in or create an account, and complete the submission form with your session details. Our team will review all proposals and notify you of the decision.
speakers.a2: Strong proposals are specific, actionable, and relevant to our audience. Focus on clear learning outcomes, practical insights, and how your session will benefit attendees. Original content and diverse perspectives are highly valued.
speakers.a3: The Call for Proposals closes on March 31, 2026. Decisions will be communicated within 2 weeks of submission.
speakers.a4: Yes! Accepted speakers receive a complimentary conference pass and recognition in our speaker community.

sponsors.title: Sponsors
sponsors.q1: How can my company sponsor WADF?
sponsors.a1: Visit the Sponsors page to explore our partnership packages ranging from Supporter (€50) to Diamond (€5,000). Each tier offers different benefits including brand visibility, speaking opportunities, and delegate passes.
sponsors.a2: Benefits vary by tier and include logo placement, social media promotion, booth space, speaking slots, delegate passes, and email list access. Diamond sponsors receive custom benefits packages.
sponsors.q3: Can I customize my sponsorship package?
sponsors.a3: Absolutely! For Gold and Diamond tiers, we're happy to discuss custom packages that align with your specific goals. Contact our partnerships team after selecting a tier.

contact.title: Still have questions?
contact.description: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our team is here to help.
